title: Recommender System
details: A program which reads a CSV file filled with multiple books and other features. Then it performs a count matrix and cosine similarity to find a book that's most similar to the one inputted.

title: RecycleNet
details: A deep learning model which is based on residual networks with a custom SVM layer to classify images of recyclable waste consisting of a single object.

title: DialogFlow ChatBot
details: By utilizing google's DialogFlow, I built a simple chatbot system that can detect intents and reply based on the category identified. I integrated this chatbot to Facebook messenger as an independent system that can function in real time.

title: Sentiment Analysis
details: This is a small NLP project which uses sentiment analysis and machine learning to classify words into positive or negative connotations.
